en.title: Customer Service Representative
en.description: We're looking for an enthusiastic Customer Service Representative to join our team. You'll be the first point of contact for our clients and candidates, providing exceptional service and support.
responsibilities: Respond to customer inquiries via phone, email, and chat
Resolve customer complaints and issues professionally
Maintain detailed records of customer interactions
Coordinate with other departments to resolve issues
Provide information about our services and job opportunities
Follow up with customers to ensure satisfaction
requirements: Excellent communication skills in Slovenian and English
Proficiency with MS Office and CRM software
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment

sl.title: Predstavnik za storitve strankam
sl.description: Iščemo navdušenega predstavnika za storitve strankam, ki se bo pridružil naši ekipi. Boste prva kontaktna točka za naše stranke in kandidate ter zagotavljali izjemno storitev in podporo.
responsibilities: Odzivanje na povpraševanja strank po telefonu, e-pošti in klepetu
Profesionalno reševanje pritožb in težav strank
Vodenje podrobnih evidenc o interakcijah s strankami
Koordinacija z drugimi oddelki za reševanje težav
Zagotavljanje informacij o naših storitvah in delovnih priložnostih
Nadaljnje spremljanje strank za zagotovitev zadovoljstva
requirements: Odlične komunikacijske veščine v slovenščini in angleščini
Zahtevane so predhodne izkušnje s storitvami za stranke
Obvladovanje MS Office in CRM programske opreme
